The lousy Bishop blocks the check with a counter check from the Queen on e1 and thereby becomes the hero of the day! It is mate in two, so White resigned. What a mess of a game, but that is also what makes chess such a funny game to play. I still think the Knight sac. on move 26 was a terrific practical chance for White to win the game, but miraculously the hippopotamus stayed above the water line.
